name: betterchange
tag_list: consultancy, change, management, change-management, moderation, digital-moderation
overview:
betterchange is a consultancy specialized in change management – crisis management as well as changes due to expansions of organizations. Betterchange accompanies customers during the whole transformation process: starting from planning and initializing the change, followed by problem analysis, target definition, strategy planning and mobilization, up to embedding, enhancement, control and sustainability of new processes.

Betterchange offers:

  • detailed problem analysis and a broad feedback in the initializing phase
  • more ideas for and contributions to a successful strategy by developing the
    change initiative
  • motivated and ambitious employees due to their optimal integration into the whole change process
  • a fast and coordinated procedure during the implementation phase
  • better acceptance of the results after having completed the transformation process.
